results.description: Northern Ireland's hopes of reaching the Euro 2020 finals are dealt a blow after the Netherlands and Germany earn vital away wins.

results.description: Wales edge Belarus 1-0 at the Borisov Arena in their Women's Euro 2021 qualifier thanks to a late winner from Rachel Rowe.
results.title: Women's Euro 2021 qualifying highlights: Belarus 0-1 Wales

results.description: Rachel Rowe, back after an injury-hit year, scores the crucial goal as Wales win 1-0 away to Belarus in their Women's Euro 2021 qualifier.

results.description: Northern Ireland beat Belarus to maintain their 100% start to Euro 2020 qualifying, while Germany score late on to beat the Netherlands.

results.title: Netherlands 4-0 Belarus: Depay, Wijnaldum & Van Dijk score in big Dutch win
